name: Halloween Trouble
description:
Someone is knocking the door! Who would be? A monster? A kid? It will be a night full of trouble!

Drop eggs to monster and candy for kids!

Click on the door and push the correct button, works great on mobile.

You can also use keyboard where LEFT and RIGHT choose the door, and UP or DOWN trow Candy and Eggs. WASD works too.

Made for fun by HomineLudens (code) and Vampirics (arts)

Powered by awesome microStudio

Play online and look at the (bad jam code quality) code at:

https://microstudio.io/HomineLudens/halloweentrouble/
